thread.title: Three teenage girls have all gone missing from a small town in Wales
thread.title_full: Three teenage girls have all gone missing from a small town in Wales

author: mirror
title: Three teenage girls have all gone missing from a small town in Wales
text:
Three teenage girls have all gone missing from a small town in Wales Chloe Davies, 16, Shanice Ross, 15, and 14-year-old Kia Higgins have not been seen since March 13 Share Shanice Ross has not been seen since Monday 13 (Photo: Wales Online) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Three teenage girls have gone missing from a small town in Wales. 
Chloe Davies, 16, Shanice Ross, 15, and 14-year-old Kia Higgins have been missing from the Pontarddulais area, in Swansea, since Monday, March 13. 
South Wales Police have issued a statement saying that they are “concerned for the welfare” of the trio. 
The force is urgently appealing for help from the public to help find them, Wales Online reports. Kia Higgens, 14, is missing with two other girls (Photo: Wales Online) The eldest of the missing girls is 16-year-old Chloe Davies (Photo: Wales Online) 
The three girls are thought to be together. 
Anyone with information about their whereabouts is asked to get in touch with the police on 101. Like us on Facebook
